title: 9-Year-Old Girls Could Be Married Off As Iraq Plans To Amend Law: Report
content: The proposed changes would mark a shift from the 1959 legislation, also known as Law 188.
summary: The proposed changes would mark a shift from the 1959 legislation, also known as Law 188.

title: Biden Should Resign, Make Kamala Harris 1st Woman President Of US: Ex-Aide
content: A former staffer of Vice President Kamala Harris urged President Joe Biden to resign and install his deputy as the first woman president of the country, although for a short duration.
summary: A former staffer of Vice President Kamala Harris urged President Joe Biden to resign and install his deputy as the first woman president of the country, although for a short duration.

title: Legal Immigration System Is Broken In US: Vivek Ramaswamy
content: Vivek Ramaswamy, top Indian-American aid to President-elect Donald Trump, expressed his support for the mass deportation plan of illegal immigrants and said that the legal immigration system in the country is "broken".
summary: Vivek Ramaswamy, top Indian-American aid to President-elect Donald Trump, expressed his support for the mass deportation plan of illegal immigrants and said that the legal immigration system in the country is "broken".

title: Footage From Hezbollah Tunnel Under Cemetery, Huge Cache Of Weapons, Rockets
content: Israel and Iran-backed Hezbollah have been fighting across the Lebanese border since the war in Gaza erupted after Hamas attacked Israeli towns last year.
summary: Israel and Iran-backed Hezbollah have been fighting across the Lebanese border since the war in Gaza erupted after Hamas attacked Israeli towns last year.

title: Hologram Of Murdered Sex Worker Put Up In Amsterdam To Catch Killer
content: Bernadett "Betty" Szabo, a 19-year-old Hungarian sex worker was murdered in 2009. Her hologram has now been put up in Amsterdam.
summary: Bernadett "Betty" Szabo, a 19-year-old Hungarian sex worker was murdered in 2009. Her hologram has now been put up in Amsterdam.

title: Trump Demands Senate Bypass Votes To Appoint Key Officials
content: US President-elect Donald Trump demanded Sunday that Republican lawmakers allow him to appoint key officials without a Senate confirmation vote, aiming to block the little remaining power Democrats have to stymie his administration.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump demanded Sunday that Republican lawmakers allow him to appoint key officials without a Senate confirmation vote, aiming to block the little remaining power Democrats have to stymie his administration.

title: Trump Offers UN Envoy Post To Republican Leader Elise Stefanik: Report
content: Donald Trump has so far won 312 electoral votes, well past the 270 needed for victory, while Kamala Harris is lagging behind at 226.
summary: Donald Trump has so far won 312 electoral votes, well past the 270 needed for victory, while Kamala Harris is lagging behind at 226.

title: Israel Urges Fans To Skip Soccer Match With France After Amsterdam Violence
content: Israel has urged fans to avoid Thursday's France-Israel football tie, which authorities fear could become a flashpoint following violence in Amsterdam following a match involving an Israeli team.
summary: Israel has urged fans to avoid Thursday's France-Israel football tie, which authorities fear could become a flashpoint following violence in Amsterdam following a match involving an Israeli team.

title: Gazans Dig Through Rubble For Bodies, Survivors Amid Fresh Israeli Attack
content: Much rattled, Mohammed Alloush, a Palestinian man from Jabalia in the northern Gaza Strip, rushed to his relatives' house on Sunday to see what had happened after it was attacked by the Israeli army.
summary: Much rattled, Mohammed Alloush, a Palestinian man from Jabalia in the northern Gaza Strip, rushed to his relatives' house on Sunday to see what had happened after it was attacked by the Israeli army.

title: Israel Strike Kills Hezbollah Commander, 8 Others In Syria: War Monitor
content: Israel struck an apartment belonging to Hezbollah in a stronghold of pro-Iran groups south of Damascus on Sunday, killing nine people including a commander, a war monitor said.
summary: Israel struck an apartment belonging to Hezbollah in a stronghold of pro-Iran groups south of Damascus on Sunday, killing nine people including a commander, a war monitor said.

title: Gunmen Kill 10 In Bar Shooting In Mexico
content: Gunmen killed 10 people in a bar in the central Mexican state of Queretaro late Saturday, authorities said, adding to a wave of violent crime that is gripping several areas of the country.
summary: Gunmen killed 10 people in a bar in the central Mexican state of Queretaro late Saturday, authorities said, adding to a wave of violent crime that is gripping several areas of the country.

title: Many Killed In Strikes On Gaza, Lebanon As Israel Faces US' Aid Deadline
content: Israeli air strikes killed dozens of people in Lebanon and Gaza Sunday, rescuers and authorities said, ahead of a US deadline for improved aid delivery to the Palestinian territory.
summary: Israeli air strikes killed dozens of people in Lebanon and Gaza Sunday, rescuers and authorities said, ahead of a US deadline for improved aid delivery to the Palestinian territory.

title: Russia, Ukraine Launch Biggest Drone Attacks Yet On Each Other
content: Russia and Ukraine both launched record drone attacks on each other overnight, despite a phone call reported by the Washington Post from US president-elect Donald Trump urging Russian President Vladimir Putin not to escalate the conflict.
summary: Russia and Ukraine both launched record drone attacks on each other overnight, despite a phone call reported by the Washington Post from US president-elect Donald Trump urging Russian President Vladimir Putin not to escalate the conflict.

title: Trump Dials Putin, Urges Him Not To Escalate War In Ukraine: Report
content: US President-elect Donald Trump has spoken to Russian President Vladimir Putin and urged him not to escalate the war in Ukraine, the Washington Post reported Sunday.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump has spoken to Russian President Vladimir Putin and urged him not to escalate the war in Ukraine, the Washington Post reported Sunday.

title: Two Powerful Earthquakes Hit Cuba Within An Hour
content: A second, more powerful quake rocked southern Cuba on Sunday, US geologists said, shortly after a first shallow tremor that did not prompt a tsunami alert.
summary: A second, more powerful quake rocked southern Cuba on Sunday, US geologists said, shortly after a first shallow tremor that did not prompt a tsunami alert.

title: Netanyahu Confirms He Okayed Pager Attacks That Killed Nearly 40 In Lebanon
content: Israel Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Sunday accepted that he had "okayed" the pager attacks in Lebanon, which had killed nearly 40 Iran-backed Hezbollah members in September.
summary: Israel Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Sunday accepted that he had "okayed" the pager attacks in Lebanon, which had killed nearly 40 Iran-backed Hezbollah members in September.

title: Bitcoin Hits $80,000 For First Time As Trump Set To Return To White House
content: Bitcoin soared to a new record high on Sunday, as traders bet that Donald Trump's return to the White House will be good for the cryptocurrency.
summary: Bitcoin soared to a new record high on Sunday, as traders bet that Donald Trump's return to the White House will be good for the cryptocurrency.

title: "I Live In Hope": A Channel Nightmare Survivor's Search For Missing Father
content: Osama Ahmed's life took a dramatic turn one night in October when the small boat that was to carry him and his father to the English coast sank shortly after setting out from France.
summary: Osama Ahmed's life took a dramatic turn one night in October when the small boat that was to carry him and his father to the English coast sank shortly after setting out from France.

title: Adani-JKH Terminal At Colombo Port Likely To Be Operational From Q1 2025
content: The first cargo ship is likely to reach Sri Lanka's Adani-John Keells Holding (JKH) West Container Terminal (WCT) in Colombo Port in the first quarter of 2025, Srilankan news website The Morning Online reported.
summary: The first cargo ship is likely to reach Sri Lanka's Adani-John Keells Holding (JKH) West Container Terminal (WCT) in Colombo Port in the first quarter of 2025, Srilankan news website The Morning Online reported.

title: Video: Nvidia's Jensen Huang Reveals Why He Doesn't Wear A Watch
content: Mr Huang, whose company Nvidia has seen its valuation skyrocket in recent years, emphasized the value of living in the moment.
